Articles.Content: Im quite new to the game and discovered it trough youtube. I have been trying to set up satelites in orbits, and have built my on and also used the one already loaded in the game. When I set it up in orbit and then end the flight it wont show on the tracker. I have tried 50km, 70km, 80km and 100km. Anyone know what I could do?

End flight ends the flight, if you want a craft to stay around you need to click on Space Center instead

The end flight button has been the bane of many players, and it will be changing to a revert flight button instead in the future.

"End Flight" destroys the flight. Go back to the space center.

Edit: Ninja'd AGAIN!! *glares at sal*
